title: riot i think my queue system is broken
body: hello community and riot this is not a troll feed back so take it a bit more serious. recently i found my teammates in normal and sometimes rank is unbalanced,i had experienced my team being too under skilled or i was put into a much harder elo game. this course me to lose much more games my win rate in last 20 games used to be 60 percent know turns out to be 30 percent sometimes i asked my teamate's rank and they said their bronze 5 while i am sliver,i also cant climb elo do to sometimes the team being unbalanced. i hope i can get a answer of why. this is not super important so i am not gonna get a ticket,howerer i hope i can an answer asap so league could be a more fun experence to me.i have some picture of prove please look  [](http:///Users/user/Desktop/046C9A0B-5C20-44BB-A65D-97BCE277E0C5.png) .  [](http:///Users/user/Desktop/86D468B6-CAE4-4493-A684-01C2A4B1B29F.png)

replies.body:
Our matchmaking system is based mostly on your MMR and the number of wins you have for that specific queue as opposed to your actual rank. You can still be matched with players in a different rank as long as your MMR's are relatively close. 

Be sure to check out our [**matchmaking guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide) to learn about how the matchmaking system works overall.

file:///Users/user/Desktop/046C9A0B-5C20-44BB-A65D-97BCE277E0C5.png  file:///Users/user/Desktop/86D468B6-CAE4-4493-A684-01C2A4B1B29F.png    is the picture, if you cant open the link watch my match history
